# Settings on the "Media redundancy" tab

The CPU 410 supports the Media Redundancy Protocol (MRP). The following settings must be used for installation of the CPU in a ring topology.

1. Select the MRP domain and configure the role of the CPU ("Manager", "Manager (Auto)" or "Client").
2. Select the "Diagnostic interrupts" check box.

Note
If the "Diagnostic interrupt" check box is not selected for the MRP Manager and an interruption of the MRP ring occurs, no message will be generated in the operator station.
